name: EpilepsyICD10CM
title: Epilepsy (ICD10CM)
description: This value set contains ICD10CM concepts for epilepsy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains ICD10CM concepts for epilepsy),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people diagnosed with intractable epilepsy. This element may map to "Diagnosis" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Tractable and intractable epilepsy.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
